data.title: Who is Zoe Salmon? Irish TV presenter formerly on Blue Peter and Dancing on Ice
data.meta_description: ZOE Salmon shot to fame when she became the face of Blue Peter.But what else has she been on? And what did she say about Roxanne Pallett?Who is Zoe Sa
data.text:
ZOE Salmon shot to fame when she became the face of Blue Peter.

But what else has she been on? And what did she say about Roxanne Pallett?

Who is Zoe Salmon?

Zoe, 38, was born January 7, 1980, and is a Northern Irish television presenter.

She shot to fame when she hosted Blue Peter from 2004 to 2008.

In 2009 Zoe appeared on Dancing on Ice and reached the quarter-finals.

The TV star also appeared on Celebrity MasterChef in 2012 and had a cameo in Russell Brand 2010 movie, Get Him To The Greek.

Zoe was crowned Miss Northern Ireland in 1999.

What has Zoe said about Roxanne Pallett?

Zoe has accused Roxanne Pallett of "ruining lives" during her time on Dancing On Ice.

In a tweet after watching Ryan Thomas reduced to tears in the Celebrity Big Brother house after he was accused of punching Roxanne, she wrote: "In tears for @ryanjamesthomas So many of us have suffered bec of #Roxanne she’s caused hurt & pain.

"The amount of people coming forward is astonishing. Her behavior scars. I’ll never forget how she treated me on Dancing on Ice. I pray she’ll change & stop ruining lives. @bbuk"

Is Zoe married?

Zoe married her long-term love Will Corrie in April 2016.

The couple revealed they eloped to Barbados.

Zoe later revealed they chose to get married on their own as her mother was to ill to attend her wedding.

Her mum Priscilla passed away in September 2016.
